Since this year’s MSB convention will be in Milwaukee, I hope that you will feel
that it will be worthwhile for a number of your staff to come. \te are currently in
the process of working out the detail® for the special Interest sessions, as you
no doubt noticed in the latest newsletter. If you feel that there are any
particular subjects on which formal papers might be presented, and you have a
staff member, or members, qualified and willing to present same, I’d certainly
appreciate having your suggestions. We’ll throw 'em in the hopper along with all
the other?,and see what come© out.
It was good to see you, though briefly, in Chicago. I hope that the financial
statement I put on the Board answered one of your primary questions, but if you
still have questions about it, please don’t hesitate to let m know. Fondest regards
to Dortha,
Regards,
